instance_template: seminar(1..10). topic("AI"; "Bio"; "Math"; "Chem"). day(1..2). timeslot("morning"; "late morning"; "early afternoon"; "late afternoon"). room(1..5). follows("morning", "late morning"). follows("late morning", "early afternoon"). follows("early afternoon", "late afternoon").
generator: 1 { topicOf(S, T) : topic(T) } 1 :- seminar(S). 1 { delivered(S, R, T, D) : room(R), timeslot(T), day(D) } 1 :- seminar(S).

hard_constraints.description: Ensure no more than one seminar is scheduled in the same room at the same time.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- delivered(S1, R, T, D), delivered(S2, R, T, D), S1 != S2.

hard_constraints.description: Restrict rooms to a maximum of two sessions per day to comply with capacity policies.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- room(R), day(D), #count{ S, T : delivered(S, R, T, D) } > 2.

hard_constraints.description: Enforce a break policy by prohibiting back-to-back sessions in the same room.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- delivered(_, R, T1, D), delivered(_, R, T2, D), follows(T1, T2).

hard_constraints.description: Comply with Room 3 maintenance by prohibiting bookings during the early afternoon slot.
Comply with Room 3 maintenance by prohibiting bookings during the late afternoon slot.
Prohibit AI seminars in Room 5 due to the lack of necessary projection equipment.
Prohibit Mathematics seminars in Room 5 due to the lack of necessary projection equipment.
Restrict AI seminars to morning or late morning slots based on presenter preferences.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- topicOf(S, "AI"), delivered(S, _, T, _), T != "morning", T != "late morning".

hard_constraints.description: Ensure Biology seminars are distributed across both days of the symposium.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- topicOf(_, "Bio"), day(D), not 1 { delivered(S, R, T, D) : topicOf(S, "Bio"), room(R), timeslot(T) }.

hard_constraints.description: Enforce policy that no two Biology seminars may occur at the same time across different rooms.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- topicOf(S1, "Bio"), topicOf(S2, "Bio"), delivered(S1, _, T, D), delivered(S2, _, T, D), S1 != S2.

hard_constraints.description: Maintain spatial separation for Chemistry talks by ensuring no room hosts more than one Chemistry session over the entire event.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- topicOf(S1, "Chem"), topicOf(S2, "Chem"), delivered(S1, R, _, _), delivered(S2, R, _, _), S1 != S2.

hard_constraints.description: Enforce room segregation policy by prohibiting Biology and Chemistry sessions in the same room on the same day.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- topicOf(S1, "Bio"), topicOf(S2, "Chem"), delivered(S1, R, _, D), delivered(S2, R, _, D).

hard_constraints.description: Mandate that the symposium opens with a Mathematics seminar in the first session of Day 1.
Mandate that the symposium closes with a Mathematics seminar in the final session of Day 2.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- not 1 { topicOf(S, "Math") : delivered(S, R, "late afternoon", 2), room(R) }.

hard_constraints.description: Limit temporal congestion by allowing no more than two combined Biology or Chemistry seminars simultaneously.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- day(D), timeslot(T), #count{ S : topicOf(S, "Bio"), delivered(S, R, T, D), room(R) ; S : topicOf(S, "Chem"), delivered(S, R, T, D), room(R) } > 2.

soft_constraints.description: Maximize venue utilization by penalizing unassigned room time slots.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("WastedSlot", (R, T, D), 1) :- room(R), timeslot(T), day(D), not delivered(_, R, T, D).

soft_constraints.description: Encourage topic diversity by penalizing time slots that feature fewer than the four available fields.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("LowDiversity", (T, D), 4 - N) :- day(D), timeslot(T), N = #count{ To : topic(To), topicOf(S, To), delivered(S, _, T, D) }.
